argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | gsummhm.b | |- B = ( Base ` G ) |
| 2 |  | gsummhm.z | |- .0. = ( 0g ` G ) |
| 3 |  | gsummhm.g | |- ( ph -> G e. CMnd ) |
| 4 |  | gsummhm.h | |- ( ph -> H e. Mnd ) |
| 5 |  | gsummhm.a | |- ( ph -> A e. V ) |
| 6 |  | gsummhm.k | |- ( ph -> K e. ( G MndHom H ) ) |
| 7 |  | gsummhm.f | |- ( ph -> F : A --> B ) |
| 8 |  | gsummhm.w | |- ( ph -> F finSupp .0. ) |
| 9 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( Cntz ` G ) = ( Cntz ` G ) |
| 10 |  | #P_cmnmnd | |- ( G e. CMnd -> G e. Mnd ) |
| 11 | 3, 10 | #P_syl | |- ( ph -> G e. Mnd ) |
| 12 | 1, 9, 3, 7 | #P_cntzcmnf | |- ( ph -> ran F C_ ( ( Cntz ` G ) ` ran F ) ) |
| 13 | 1, 9, 11, 4, 5, 6, 7, 12, 2, 8 | #P_gsumzmhm | |- ( ph -> ( H gsum ( K o. F ) ) = ( K ` ( G gsum F ) ) ) |
